comment.author: 35933856@N08
comment._content: I was at first surprised by how clean and bare the overhead and bulkheads are in this photo.  No wires, cable-ways, junction boxes, breakers...  Then I realized this was before the days of electronics at sea.

comment.realname: Thank you for visiting my page.
comment.author: 92599451@N08
comment._content: As a Marine Engineer I can see the beauty in simplicity of this era, but I have to say I'm happier at sea with everything being monitored 24/7, these were the days of great engineering and ingenuity ,great photo.
